text: A man who was thought to be dead was taken by his friends to be buried. As he was about to be put into the tomb, the man came to life and began to hit the lid of the coffin. What are you doing, you fools? "He told the surprised attendees after they opened the coffin". I'm alive, you know. I'm not dead. His words left the debtors perplexed. Finally one of them said, "Friend, the doctors and the priests have testified that you are dead. How is it possible that the experts were wrong? So they screw the lid of the coffin back and buried it properly. FIN
title: Los expertos
author: nan Anónimo
